author: Rick Stein
method: Whip the cream in a bowl until soft peaks just start to form – it’s important not to over-whisk it.  Sift in the icing sugar, then add the rosewater and the now cool saffron milk and strands. Whisk together for a minute until smooth and a few bubbles appear on the surface. Pour gently into small serving bowls or glasses and chill overnight.  Decorate with sliced pistachios, and silver leaf if you like. Serve.
ingredients: 450g/1lb double cream,  50g/1¾oz icing sugar,  1 tsp rosewater,  pinch saffron strands, soaked in 100ml/3½fl oz warm milk for 15 minutes,  few chopped pistachios and edible silver leaf (optional)
